name: HIDESUBMIT Action Tags
description: Allows users to conditionally hide various Submit/Save/Next instance buttons on surveys and/or data entry forms using Action Tags and branching logic.

action-tags.description: Hides all save buttons on data entry forms and both the Submit/Next Page button and 'Take this survey again' button on surveys if the field is visible due to branching logic.
